name: Unhatched
description: A small, chaotic evil undead creature that embodies darkness and malice, with a ghostly skeletal appearance and a chilling aura.
memorable: It uniquely punishes those who attempt to heal or aid others, making it a fearsome adversary.
goals: To curse and harm those who engage in restorative magic.
relations: May be related to other undead beings and could be found alongside necromancers or other malevolent entities.
environment: Often found in dark, cursed places where death hangs thick in the air.
strengths: Resistant to necrotic damage and conditions while possessing strong multiattack capabilities.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack actions with a combination of claw and bite attacks, alongside a damaging breath weapon.
most_powerful_ability: Desiccating Breath unleashes choking dust that inflicts significant necrotic damage and silences foes.
senses: Possesses darkvision, allowing it to see in darkness within 60 feet.
skills: Skilled in perception with a +2 modifier.
additional_information: Has advantage on attacks against creatures that have recently healed.
Can cast chill touch and minor illusion at will.
Can cast bane once per day to weaken enemies.
Part of its nature embodies a curse against healing.
Immune to poison and many debilitating conditions.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with spells focusing on necromancy and illusion, utilizing an Intelligence-based ability.
test_queries: chaotic evil flying creature with necromantic powers
undead monster with a powerful breath attack
